body.description: SHARECOOK Silverware Set Durable and simple to maintain, this 20 pieces silverware set is ideal for the daily rigors of your kitchen. The forks, spoons and knives are ergonomically crafted for a comfortable dining experience. - Smoothened edges and ergonomic handles. - Complete silverware set for full service. - Frosted look with simple detailing. - Dishwasher safe for hassle-free cleaning. All about Durability Our silverware are crafted from good quality 18/0 stainless steel; You'll never have to worry about the knives struggling to cut, the spoons bending as you chow away, or the prongs of the forks curling out of shape like others do. Luxury Designs Make your dining table stand out with a silverware set that is eye-catching without being visually overpowering. Inspired by minimalist elegance, the stainless steel silverware set is designed to beautifully blend into any setting. No cheap-looking gaudy detailing here. Just simple design with clean lines that come off as timeless. Maintenance Made Easy No struggling with pastes and sprays to polish your silverware set. This premium silverware set doesn’t need all that effort to keep it in great condition. The lovely look remains in beautifully shape without your intervention, and with the unique silverware set being dishwasher safe, clean-up will be a breeze! Complement your Dining with an Effortlessly Elegant Silverware Set Upgrade your silverware set with stainless steel silverware strong enough to withstand heavy daily use and elegant enough to complement the fanciest of dinners. Blending premium materials with experienced craftsmanship and timeless detailing, SHARECOOK stainless steel silverware set treats you to impressive durability, eye-catching aesthetics and convenient functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Would forsure buy again. Perfect spoons for chili and soup. I love the aesthetic of them. No rusting or anything either. Really good quality and adds flare to the dinner table for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clean and sleek lines .
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter saw this flatware and wanted to have some to complete her table ware. I have purchased it for her for Christmas, so we have not used it yet. I have no more comment at this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THESE ARE SO COOL
reviews.reviewText: I honestly don’t think I’ve ever been more in love with a silverware set. These are not a matte black like they look in some pictures. They are a very dark metal so don’t expect them to be pitch black, they still have a metallic sheen to them. They look so cool, they remind me of the nightmare before Christmas. They are so heavy and sturdy as well, I love the feeling of them. So worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and color! Love the sizes and shapes! Will probably order one more set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you’re looking for aesthetic…
reviews.reviewText: I’d say that this silverware set fits the aesthetic for a modern, more contemporary feel. They’re sturdy and they hold up in presentation; however, they are dishwasher safe. Even with the silverware compartment in the dishwasher meaning of the pieces, particularly the knives, the matte finish wore after a few washes. I’ve since switched to hand washing these items which seems to be a better fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this “goldwear “ holds up well in dishwasher. No tarnish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need them!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this set! The quality is great, and they look like they cost way more than they did. I honestly love the variety in sizes and the gold finish is *chefs kiss*. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT MATTE BLACK
reviews.reviewText: These by no means are matte black they do have a more shiny bronzy almost black finish, however they are still very dark so it work if you like black silverware. It’s actually really hard to find real matte black silverware so I’m keeping them they are very nice and sturdy with a great shape. One of my spoons is already scrapped up on the edges it’s pretty rough all I did was put it in the dish washer so that’s sad can’t expect me to hand wash all my silverware
